CustomField.formula:
IF ( ISPICKVAL(OSFMX_DistributorOrCarrier__c, "Distribución CMG"), "Alberto García", IF ( ISPICKVAL(OSFMX_DistributorOrCarrier__c, "Distribución NGM"), "Alejandro Quintanilla", IF ( ISPICKVAL(OSFMX_DistributorOrCarrier__c, "Distribución TMG"), "Alejandro Quintanilla",
IF ( ISPICKVAL(OSFMX_DistributorOrCarrier__c, "Distribución DGJ"), "Arturo Magaña", IF ( ISPICKVAL(OSFMX_DistributorOrCarrier__c, "DGJ-Bajio"), "Arturo Magaña", IF ( ISPICKVAL(OSFMX_DistributorOrCarrier__c, "Distribución DGQ"), "Alberto García", IF ( ISPICKVAL(OSFMX_DistributorOrCarrier__c, "Distribución GNP-Mérida"), "Álvaro Ramírez", IF ( ISPICKVAL(OSFMX_DistributorOrCarrier__c, "Distribución GNP"), "Álvaro Ramírez", "N/A" ))))))))
CustomField.label: Gerente B2B Aprobador
